// R1 will contain our address to write to
ADDI R0, 32, R1
// R2 will contain our current value to write
// Initialize it to 0
ADDI R0, 0, R2
// R3 will contain our control variable (e.g. end)
ADDI R0, 128, R3
/////////////////////////////////
ADDI R2, 4, R2
ADDI R3, 4, R3
SW R1, R2, 0
// R4 contains our loaded data
LW R1, 0, R4
BLTU R2, R3, -6
// Enter a bogus instruction to trigger trap e.g. 32'h0
// Trigger trap
32'h0000_0000
// Data lies beyond here

32'b0000_0010_0000_00000_000_00001_0010011
32'b0000_0000_0000_00000_000_00010_0010011
32'b0000_1000_0000_00000_000_00011_0010011
32'b0000_0000_0100_00010_000_00010_0010011
32'b0000_0000_0100_00001_000_00001_0010011
32'b0000_000_00010_00001_010_00000_0100011
32'b0000_0000_0000_00001_010_00100_0000011
32'b1111_111_00011_00010_110_10101_1100011
32'b0000_0000_0000_0000_0000_0000_0000_0000

12   8  5 4  1
1111_1111_1000


0@000
00000001000000000000000010010011
@0004
00000000000000000000000100010011
@0008
00001000000000000000000110010011
@000c
00000000010000010000000100010011
@0010
00000000001000001010000000100011
@0014
11111110001100010110101011100011
@0018
00000000000000000000000000000000
